content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal favorites. However, I can tell you that Little Women (2019) has received critical acclaim and was nominated for six Academy Awards, including Best Picture. It is a heartwarming and poignant adaptation of the classic novel, featuring outstanding performances from its cast. On the other hand, Annihilation (2018) is a visually stunning and thought-provoking science fiction thriller that pushes boundaries and challenges expectations. Both films have received positive reviews and are worth checking out.
